Description: Taldor founded.
Armag, a barbarian warlord, terrorizes Southwest Numeria and nearby lands.
Nex and Geb go to war.
Geb committs ritual suicide. He returns as a ghost.
Absalom founded. Aroden, the Last Azlanti, raises the Starstone from the depths of the Inner Sea and becomes a living god.
Taldor's Second Army of Exploration explores Numeria but is pushed back by native hostility.
Nex vanishes during a Gebbite attack that kills thousands.
Aroden (god) slays Tar Baphon (living)
Battle of Grasyhot begins. Queen Boliga Bharsolm clashes with 30 tribes of the hill giant chief Urgo Axbiter.
Axbiter slain. Hill giants defeated. Queen Boliga killed.
Aaramor construction begins to prevent giant population from reaching dangerous numbers again.
Lord of Aaramor orders the demolition of cities stone bridges in favor of wood to deter giant attacks.
Taldor's Third Army of exploration completes its conquest of Southern Avistan, including hte land that will become the nation of Cheliax.
Andoran founded.
Norgorber passes the test of the starstone and ascends to godhood.
Taldor's 5th Army of Exploration expands nearby but ignores Numeria.
Elves return to Golarion.
Cayden Cailean drunkenly passes the test of the Starstone and ascends to godhood.
Cheliax is founded as the Westernmost province of Taldor.
Cheliax Founded.
Tar Baphon is reborn as the lich called The Whispering Tyrant and conquers Ustalav.
Battle of Falheart. Prince Rathorn and Sabline the Traitor charge in but their entire armies mysteriously die before battle begins.
Karamoss creates the Red Redoubt and begins his siege of Absalom.
Iomedae completes the Test of the Starstone and becomes a goddess and Aroden's Herald.
The Empire of Taldor calls soldiers from all over their realm and marches against the Whispering Tyrant of Ustalav, in a war known as the Shining Crusade.
Iomedae is born in Cheliax.
Iomedae joins the Shining Crusade against the Whispering Tyrant Tar-Baphon
Whispering Tyrant Tar Baphon (lich now) kills Arazni
The Whispering Tyrant breaks Iomedae's sword but she fuses the pieces together, forming Heart's Edge. Her 6th miracle.
The Whispering Tyrant is defeated by the Shining Crusade and imprisoned within Gallowspire.
Iomedae completes her tenth act, ruling Kantaria for a year and a day. She gives Heart's Edge to House Narikopolus.
Iomedae passes the Test of the Starstone
Taldan Governor Aspex creates the new nation of Cheliax from Andoran, Cheliax, Galt, and Isger.
Cheliax breaks from Taldor.
Chelish explorers discover the ruins of Ghol-Gan in what will be called The Shackles.
Chelish Army and Navy repel Garund and win control of the Arch of Aroden. Cheliax controls the entrance to the Inner Sea.
Raiders target trade ships ferrying goods between Cheliax and Sargava.
Taldor founds its westernmost colony, Cheliax
Casandalee rebels against Unity and flees. She is eventually killed but not before making a backup of her mind.
Casandalee transfers her mind to the AI-Core and hides it in the Scar of the Spider.
Casandalee is killed near in the spaceship wreck beneath Iadenveigh
Everwar begins.
Gojan the Sharp, a pathfinder, travels to Numeria and requests permission to enter Silver Mount.
Gojan enters Silver Mount.
Gojan returns to Abaslom with his findings.
Gojan returns to Numeria but disappears and is never heard from again.
Cheliax conquers Nidal.
Aroden defeats avatar of demon lord Deskari
Hellion leaves Silver Mount and rebels against Unity.
Hellion arrives and settles in Scrapwall.
Scrapwall is depleted of usable relics and skymetal.
Sidrah Imeruss awakens and preaches against the Kellid taboo on tech. Founds the Technic League.
Sidrah and the technic league reach Silver Mount. She is killed by her second in command.
The Technic League enters Silver Mount for the first time.
The violet light atop Black Hill first flares up.
Torch founded.
Aroden's death. Chelish Civil War begins.
Aroden's death. Chelish Civil War begins.
Worldwound opens. Numeria is flooded with Crusaders passing through to the battlefront.
Silver Ravens founded by Jackdaw, Amyreid, Ba, Kyda, and Brakisi.
Aroden dies. Eye of Abendego forms. Worldwound opens, destroying Sarkoris.
Silver Ravens eject Thrune forces from the city.
Weather patterns open a sinkhole at Crowhollow that exposes tech. Mountain Crow tribe hides this discovery from Technic League.
Kintargo attacked by Nidalise Vampires. Song of Silver is first heard in Kintargo and vampires are defeated.
Kintaro attacked by Rivozair, a great Blue Dragon but the Silver Ravens force him to flee.
The growing Worldwound forces Sarkorians to flee South towards Ustalav. Princess Maraet Ordranti denies them sanctuary, leading to a slaughter called the Demonskin War
The Butcher of Courtaud, legendary figure of the Demonskin War, is caught and executed. He vows to continue to protect his family and Ustalav.
Seldinin Chonaz Hellknight of the Pyre founds the HK Order of the Godclaw.
Technic League arrives at Crowhollow but their initial group is never seen again. Entire Mountain Crow tribe vanishes.
Crusaders build Castle Urion as a gift to the Barbarian's Black Sovereign, occupied by Iomedaean crusaders.
House Thrune defeats House Davian in the Battle of a Hundred Kings, the decisive conflict in the Chelish Civil War.
Sargava secedes from Cheliax, Baron Grallus pays the Free Captains for protection from Thrune.
Abrogail I forms a pack with Asmodeus. The armies of Hell enter Cheliax under her command.
Thrune siezes control of Cheliax, attempts to end the Chelish Civil War.
Infernal Army descends upon Kintargo.
Kyda and Amyreid killed by the pit fiend named Oughorthan. Jackdaw surrenders.
Brakisi kills Ba. Thrunes control Kintargo. Silver Ravens disbanded and redacted.
House Thrune emerges victorious. Asmodeus becomes official state religion. Capital moved to Egorian.
Thrune fleet arrives in Shackles and is quickly sunk.
Meyib Tanessen, Changling priestess of Asmodeus crafts the infernal engines in the Temple of Asmodeus.
Iadenveigh founded by exiles from Molthune.
Citizens discover their town has been infiltrated by duplicates. Ranger Barton Cabers dies fighting them.
The Order of the Godclaw withdraws from Mendev and begins construction of Citadel Dinyar.
Pirates of the Shackles unite under Hurrcane King Kerdak Bonefist.
The capital is moved from Ardis to Caliphas. Prince Valislav Ordranti dies of an unnamed illness soon after.
Prince Aduard III ascends the throne. Mircalla Caliphvaso, long time consort gives birth to his son Reneis, who is adopted by Countess Carmilla Laiphvaso.
First Captain's Regatta. 6 of the 17 ships that enter are scuttled, capsized, or lost at sea.
The Glorious Age of the Free Captains begins.
Kevoth-Kul unites the Numeria tribes and takes Starfall, allies with Technic League, and becomes Black Sovereign.
Lord Ellis Mayheart passes away at the age of 83, leaving his sword to his eldest son, Carliss.
Kevoth-Kul makes Starfall his capital, allies with Technic League,a nd becomes the last Black Sovereign.
The Chastel Massacre. The Devil in Gray rampages through Chastel, killing 19 before disappearing.
Furkas Xoud is exiled from the Technic League for his religion and builds the Choking Tower.
Black Sovereign Kevoth-Kul burns down the pathfinder lodge. Pathfinders establish secret lodges.
Furkas Xoud steals Casandalee's body and speaks with it briefly. He is killed by her defenses.
A mercenary group is formed around the search for a collection of stolen nude-paintings of Lady Caliphaso. The group is called the Justice Gorls.
Professor Valeska Martin goes missing at Site 17, a Shining Crusade Era tomb.
The Clickboom gang of Caliphas is annihilated to a man by the Justice Gorls.
Professor Martin is found to be a prisoner of the Skanktown Killas gang outside the city. Skanktown leader is killed and Agu is the new Queen of Skanktown.
Annihilator robot destroys many towns before retreating into the Felldales with prisoners.
Technic League gains powerful new leader, Ozmyn Zaidow who strengthens the organization.
Skulks arrive in Black Hill Caves and force open the habitat doors.
Meyanda arrives in Torch and enters Black Hill Caves at night. She makes a deal with the Skulks to guard the caves.
Meyanda contacts Garmen Ulreth and secures a hiding place for the power relay in his warehouse.
Meyanda shuts down the failsafe extinguishing the torch atop Black Hill. Khonnir discovers Meyanda's entering the pond.
Heart's Edge is recovered by the Godclaw in Isger and they bring it to Citadel Dinyar.
First Expedition: halfling adventurers killed by giant vermin.
Second Expedition: local thugs make it to the skulks but are slaughtered by them.
Third Expedition: Khonnir Baine's group rob the skulks and enter the habitat. They return with a dormant repair drone.
Fourth Expedition: Brigh Worshippers from out of town make it to the science deck before being slain.
Fifth Expedition: Khonnir Baine's second attempt makes it to the habitat module but does not return.
Tokala and Maginnis team up with others to assist Torch
Khonnir Baine rescued by the IG Party
Power Relay discovered and deactivated by the IG Party. Nomkath and Scaith join the IG Party.
Meyanda comes to Torch and is defeated. Dolga is killed by friendly fire (Gavrilo)
IG Party departs Torch to investigate Scrapwall at the request of Town Council.
IG Party rescues several Saranrae paladins, recruits Ulfred, and frees Aldronard's Ghost.
IG Party arrives at Scrapwall, passes the main gate after meeting Sevroth and the Silverhawks.
IG Party meets Dinvaya.
IG Party attacks Smilers, bypasses their outer patrols, and kills Birdfood on the dunes.
IG Party kills Marrow, frees Whiskifiss and befriends the Redtooth Raiders.
IG Party travels across Southern Scrapwall and defeats the Manticore.
IG Party defeats the wraiths in Southeastern Scrapwall. Eldrin Discovered.
Paladin Alexeara Cansellarion founds a new Knightly Order, takes Citadel Dinyar, and begins the Glorious Reclamation.
IG Party assauts the Junk Mines, frees Olbryn, and retreats back South.
IG Party visits Redtooth warren but finds it destroyed by Lords of Rust.
IG Party assaults Scrapwall Arena, kills Helskarg, frees Cuha.
IG Party defeats Nalakai and the Cult of Hellion.
IG Party defeats Kulgara and her soldiers.
Hellion destroyed by Maginnis weapon 'Justice,' Tokala's divinity lost.
Tokala, Maginnis are granted a home in Torch by the city council.
Gavrilo is killed by the IG Party.
IG Party reaches Iadenveigh, finds the last battle of Casandalee.
IG Party enters the Choking Tower.
Eldrin is killed by the abyssal thief.
IG Party meets & recruits Kroktah
El Guapo captured and sentenced to death for piracy, murder, extortion, burglary, adultery, and sodomy.
Jilia Bainilus, Lord Mayor of Kintargo goes missing.
Captain Freya Kusanagi is temporarily assigned to Barzillai Thrune for covert rebel suppression campaign.
IG Party reaches the Scar of the Spider
Femmick Embersword & friends are hired to deal with a bandit menace on a rural road North of Kintargo.
Night of Ashes. Captain Freya & her team depart Kintargo aboard The Western Star, bound for Remesianna.
Femmick investigates the burned ruins of the Silver Star & Fair Fortune Livery.
The Western Star arrives at Remesiana. Freya & company depart for Longacre. El Guapo stays and takes another ship.
Aria Park Protests end in violence.
Captain Freya and her team arrive in Longacre, enlisted by Archbaron Fex to investigate rebel activity.
Femmick & friends meet Laria Longroad and The Silver Ravens are reborn in the basement of her coffeeshop.
The lancing of Riley Kels. His and other dissidents heads are displayed in the public square by the Church of Iomedae.
"Red Jills" gang members eliminated/absorbed by The Silver Ravens.
Severed rebel heads are stolen at night. A bloody battle at the Church ensues. Riley Kels the ghast is killed again.
Church of Iomedae converted to Temple of Asmodeus.
Silver Ravens capture and impersonate Lt. Yurimaru to sabotage investigations aimed at rebel groups.
El Guapo arrives by mule in Longacre. He is destitute (again) and on the run from Naval authorities (again).
Rebel Stronghold at "Court of Spears" is destroyed. Lencia Visserene escapes. Former Sheriff Rhona Staelish is killed.
Femmick's vivid dream about the Night of Ashes.
Migos driven to flee the Scar of the Spider
Archbaron Fex of Longacre declares the rebellion has been driven out of his province. Gives Freya's team 3 weeks off.
Silver Ravens free a group of anti-Thrune dissidents being held at a salt granary.
Public Excrutiation of Clenchjaw is thwarted by the Silver Ravens. First Dottari Guard patrol attack & killings.
Riot at Black-Whale prison. All active members of City Police - Undead Specialist Squad (CP-USS) are lost.
Genia Richton, Heir of the Richton family is killed in her home over her husband's gambling debts. Her husband Martos and daughter Farrah go missing.
Detective Hollace Marsh asks to be assigned the Richton family murder/disappearance case.
Detective Marsh dies in "The Succubus" brothel. Witnesses report a skeleton with axes stood over him while he screamed. He had no apparent injuries.
35 people are murdered a secret sewer hideout. Martos Richton body found there. 30% of Lepidstadt thieves guild leadership eliminated.
Kovira, Dismas, Dinvaya, and Gaspar are recruited to CP-USS. They are immediately assigned to the Richton case, which is now CP-USS jurisidtion.
Hocum's Museum assaulted by Silver Ravens. Nox escapes & Azvernathi Raul is banished from Kintargo.
Captain Freya's team is attacked at their Inn in the capital. El Guapo fights off several assassins while naked.
Funeral for Porcia and Aneran Victocora.
Dominion of the Black destroyed in Scar of the Spider. IG Party meets Casandalee.
Farrah Delilah Richton is apprehended & surrenders peacefully to Officer Kovira of CP-USS. She is placed in the Lepidstadt Foster Care system.
Death of Professor Petros Lorrimor, near Harrowstone Prison, Ravengro.
The Warden's Ghost is taken from Harrowstone Prison in Ravengro.
Kendra Lorrimor recruits Kovira & her CP-USS allies to investigate her father's death. CP-USS Teleports from Lepidstadt to Ravengro.
Captain Freya's "private security firm" is hired by Loredana Viorica of the Uskwood Inn, Kantaria.
Battle for Scrapwall, Technic League (Krastus) is victorious
The Glorious Reclamation prison "Hardship's Hearth" is attacked. Zara Orcelani escapes to the Uskwood Inn.
Varl Wex killed by Silver Ravens, his blade is sold to the Temple of Abadar to be destroyed.
CP-USS determines Professor Lorrimor's death to be murder by 'Phantasmal Killer' spell.
Kantaria docks burned. Dockmaster Jonas escaped. Defensive towers are also burned or sabotaged. Angel-Bro defeated.
Femmick, Azwraith, and Boudicca captured at the Holding House. They are severely tortured by the Kyton Ghenemal
The Poison Pen of Kintargo, Marquel Aulorian is rescued by the Silver Ravens and boards the Scourge of Belial.
Freya & Co. lay low in the Fungus Caves. Corrine assigned to Captain Freya's team as liaison.
Poison Pen resumes distributing illegal poetry in Kintargo.  The Wasp Nest is abandoned by the Silver Ravens & Discovered by Dottari.
Captain Freya Kusanagi inducted into the Hell Knight Order and granted the rank of signifier.
The Whispering Way visits Caromarc, traps him, takes control of The Beast of Lepidstadt
Lore, Caleb, and Gabriel infiltrate the Holding House and free their friends, 4 hellknights of the torrent, and several civilians.
Order of the Torrent Hell Knights join the Silver Ravens
CP-USS eliminates the 5 ghosts haunting Harrowstone prison, freeing Vesorianna, the ghost of the warden's wife.
The Beast of Lepidstadt steals the Seasage Effigy from Lepidstadt University and is apprehended. City guards are injured but none die.
Glorious Reclamation First Knight Oppian Nevilindor is captured by Freya & Co. Lencia Visserine, Angel Knight is killed.
Farrah Richton transferred to Lepidstadt Asylum after being rejected by 3 homes in the Foster Care System.
Linton Demeer appointed as the new Mayor of Kantaria by the ruling council.
IG Party returns to Torch to 'vacation'
CP-USS leaves Ravengro to deliver forbidden tomes to Lepidstadt.
The Lucky Bones is secretly cleared and claimed by the Silver Ravens.
Maginnis leaves the party, and Numeria.
Oppian Nevilindor arrives in the captal as the prisoner of Captain Freya Kusanagi.
CP-USS Clears out the "gobbo-ghoul" caves.
Day of Justice. Clenchjaws bar Burned.
Signifier Freya Kusanagi promoted to Hellknight in the Order of the Rack.
Public Execution of Oppian Nevilindor & assassination of Duke Fellatio. J'mal goes missing.
Rodney "Danger" Smith is recruited to CP-USS.
Femmik escapes from Willowbrook Sanitarium along with several other patients.
Farrah Richton escapes Lepidstadt Asylum. Several guards are killed by "a skeleton with axes."
The Devil in Gray, menace of Courtaud, is slain by CP-USS.
Silver Ravens depart aboard the Scourge of Belial for Acisazi & Vyre.
The Whispering Way reaches Ascanor Lodge and visits Estovion, compelling him to assist them with the werewolves.
Lepidstadt prison 'The Black Whale' is secured by CP-USS. Detective Kai Gin recruited to CP-USS.
Kendra Lorrimor begins investigating the Richton Family history.
Freya & Co. depart the capital en route to Senara at the request of Archbaron Fex.
CP-USS begins investigating the charges against the Beast of Lepidstadt.
Silver Ravens encounter the North Sea Leviathan and rescue her young from Menotheguro's skum.
Estovion arranges a meeting between Auren Vrood (WW) and Mathus Mordrinacht.
Senara thieves guild "Blood Daggers" defeated by Draymus. Freya spares them and forms an alliance.
Kendra voices her concerns over the Richton Family events to her father's old friend, Judge Embreth Darymid.
Blessing of Unicorns assaulted by Freya & Co. 3 Unicorns killed in initial assault, 4 more in later battles. 4 horns recovered.
Farrah Richton seeks out the judge that remanded her to the Asylum, but instead meets Darymid.
Vorgstag and Grime escape CP-USS at the Chymic Works. Costine is captured and spared for now.
Judge Darymid introduces Farrah Richton to Kendra Lorrimor.
Kvalca Sain is killed by the Whispering Way and Mathus Mordrinacht consumes a portion of her heart.
4 day manhunt for Vorkstag & Grine by the mercenary group "Savage Security" funded by Kendra Lorrimor.
Suriel banished to Abaddon where he meets Shensen.
The Beast of Lepidstadt is found not-guilty of all murder charges, but is banished from Lepidstadt for vandalism. Kate Blackwood recruited to CP-USS.
Skull & Shackles AP begins. Party is pressed into service aboard the Wormwood.
Silver Ravens reach Acisazi and participate in its defense against the undead of Menotheguro.
CP-USS travels to Shloss Caromarc to investigate the origins of the Beast of Lepidstadt. Elfrip recruited to CP-USS.
Vorkstag kills Judge Aldaar before he and Grine are killed by Savage Security at Judge Darymid's home.
Balisse angel in the service of the Glorious Reclamation is killed and defiled (heart removed).
Silver Ravens destroy Menotheguro and depart for Vyre.
IG Party journeys to Starfall in disguise.
Kendra Lorrimor becomes a Foster-Parent and formally adopts Farrah Richton as her ward.
Savage Security operatives inducted into Lepidstadt Police Investigative Unit as a new squad by Judge Darymid.
Judge Darymid re-opens her investigation into the Whispering Way with help from K.Lorrimor and Detective Richton.
Fort Arego is assaulted by Freya & Co. Glorius Reclamation is defeated. Viona Kadarius is killed.
Kai is killed in a friendly-fire incident while battling an ancient evil tree.  The handle of the broken-blade is recovered.
Technic League Captain "The Shade" is killed during an illegal night auction in Starfall sewers.
Kai is taken to Lepidstadt and raised.
Bujon, Storm of Cheliax is defeated and captured by the Silver Ravens and then released into the custody of Vyre.
Freya & Co. battle Archbaron Darellus Fex and are defeated until they strike a deal with Visperthul. Fex is killed.
Silver Ravens reach Vyre and establish contact with Molly Mayapple.
The Promethean and the Beast are both destroyed atop Shloss Caromarc. Count Caromarc is rescued, but has lost his mind.
Freya is stripped of her rank & status as a Hell Knight. During her shame walk, Zara Orcelani defends her.
Heist at Abadar Temple foiled by the Silver Ravens.
Technic League Captain "Avernethy" is killed.
Caromarc is transported to Lepidstadt where he is committed to the Ledpistadt Asylum.
Party begins planning a Mayonaisse (mutiny).
The Dapper Street Murders. Wilfordshire Tailors is the scene of a brutal quadruple homicide with no suspects.
CP-USS takes the Beast's brain via teleport to Torch, Numeria where it will be transplanted to Caromarc's Wood-Golem.
Florio Cento's chief competition (a slave market) is destroyed by Freya & Co.
Silver Ravens secure alliance with Queen of Delights. Gabriel stays overnight.
Nathin Barksdale is offered promotion to Admiral at the shipyard, but he declines. The job falls to Rear Admiral LeBeau.
Darymid arranges for Farrah to interview Caromarc. She learns of his experience with the Whispering Way.
Brado Pachia hires Freya & Co. for a series of small favors.
CP-USS breaks a Technic-League siege on Torch by freeing their tribal elder hostages. Kate is killed and raised.
Silver Ravens return to Kintargo, but immediately depart for Menador Gap to cut off reinforcements.
The Beast of Lepidstadt is reborn in her new body as Clarissa 'Rissa' Elssa Caromarc. Rissa helps repel the Technic League's last assault.
Technic League Captain "Nalkii" investigates Avernethy's disappearance and reports her findings.
Party assists in the taking of the Man's Promise and are made part of its prize crew.
Freya & Co. battle Efisio Pera, Chief Spy for Visperthul. Freya follows him out a 5th story window and defeats him in the street.
The top 4 agents of Visperthul in Cheliax are arrested/killed in a sting orchestrated by Corrine. Freya promoted to Major.
Man's promise runs aground during a storm off the Northeast coast of Bonewrack Isle. Several crew are kidnapped by grindylow.
Silver Ravens destroy Menador Keep and close the gap. Lucian Thrune is slain in single combat by Caleb.
Freya & Co. invited to Night of the Pale Ball. Introduced to Count Sethic and Baroness Lesvion.
CP-USS begins traveling back to Ustalav via Meyanda's 'truck.'
Party rescues kidnapped crew and returns to Man's Promise. Party learns the Man's Promise officers are planning a Mustard (mutiny).
Paracount Sethic's pig farm destroyed
The Gray Men attempt to assassinate the Lord Mayor's Son, Nicolo but they are foiled by Freya & Co.
CP-USS overnights in the Scar of the Spider site of the old-gunslingers last-rest.
Technic League Captain "Krastus"'s Rust-Risen facility assaulted. Krastus killed.
CP-USS encounters the Eastern border-guard of Dravod-Knock. They detour peacably.
Hetamon Haace rescued by Silver Ravens. His mother, the succubus Natsiel, is killed.
Meyanda drops off CP-USS at the Northeastern corner of Shudderwood.
CP-USS investigates the ancient dwarven city of Lorzobun, following the pull of the broken blade shard.
Upon return, a fight breaks out and the Man's Promise officers are overpowered. The Party now controls the ship.
Caleb scouts the Kintarogo Opera House.
CP-USS clears Fort Austra of all undead, including a lesser vampire Tech-Witch. The circlet is recovered but not identified.
Ruby Massacre. Shensen and Jilia Bainilus are rescued by the Silver Ravens. Nox 2.0 is destroyed.
Technic League Captain Ghartone killed.
The Man's Promise Sails into Rickety Squibs and is never seen again. She is renamed "The Pillager's Knife" or TPK for short.
Night of the Pale Ball. Vokadus Fex attacks Freya but is defeated and killed. Party meets Abrogail 2. Mysterio's magic show.
CP-USS destroys the Medusa colony at Demon Skull, another broken blade shard is recovered.
The Battle of Kintargo. Song of Silver activated by Shensen. Lothario, Azwraith, Octavio, Rexus, and Boudicca are chosen.
Gabriel killed by an arrow fired by the Dottari Chief.
Technic League Compound assaulted, Ozmyn and his inner-circle are killed. Kroktah killed.
Shipwreck survivors of "HIMS Surprise" aka "The Rizzen" agree to join TPK crew.
Gabriel resurrected by Manticce, of Vyre.
An ancient dwarven stronghold is found Southwest of Rickety Squibs and the soul of Brogan inhabits Storgrim's axe.
Barzillai Thrune, atop Rivozair, destroys the Devil's Nursery Orphanage. Clenchjaw dies but saves 65 children from the fire.
Freya & Co Liberate Belde from the Glorious Reclamation. Freya wins trivia contest vs Yunero, an Ogre Mage
Party infiltrates Palace of Fallen Stars. Learns of Black Sovereign's addiction to numerian fluids.
A pack of Squables monkeys attack TPK Crew. Bilge and Lil-Vaughan are 'recruited.'
El Guapo, diguised as Titus Vel, is arrested for public drunkenness.
Party embarks to hunt the Juvi-Tarrasque, a creature they need to make a powerful cure for the Black Sovereign.
Freya & Co conscript themselves as ship guards for the Ballerina, cargo ship bound for Pezzack.
Barzillai Thrune and Rivozair defeated.
The Black Sovereign eats a healburger and is cured of his addiction to Numerian Fluids. Unity attacks the Palace of Fallen Stars.
CP-USS Returns to Lepidstadt, surrenders their City Commission, and are deputized as Deputy Ustalav Marshalls directed to hunt the Whispering Way.
Pirate operation at Rachikan Ruins dismantled. Draymus is left there with 40 corpses.
Bob Applewood kidnapped by Paracount Sethic.
CP-USS Departs Lepidstadt via the South road. They execute a gang of bandits on the road and then turn East to Shudderwood.
A blue dragon attacks Governor's Manse and it burns. All prisoners freed. Strix raids that night.
Party Barge setup by Draymus & Co. Attacked by Bellflower Network. Draymus & Co retreat.
Thundering Tyrant seen in West Shudderwood near the standing stones.
Rouvanel declares its independence from Cheliax. Bleakbridge renamed to Silver Span.
Body of Wario Donager discovered in the Vespam Artisans courtyard by Silver Ravens. Aula Crispin corpse found at morgue.
Assault on Bellflower Barn by Jason & Co. Building leveled. Most Bellflower agents escaped.
CP-USS Arrives at Ascanor Lodge.
Paracount Sethic's mansion attacked. Sethic captured, Bob discovered and freed but his mind is destroyed.
CP-USS Departs Ascanor Lodge for the Stairs of the Moon
El Guapo procures a Wish from Manticce and uses it to heal Bob
CP-USS joins the Broken-Ones in a fight vs the Silverhides and forces the latter to retreat.
After fighting the Vilkacis, Gaspar writes a warrant for Estovion's arrest and sends it to Lepidstadt via Rissa.
The Pillager's Knife (TPK) emerges from Rickety Squibs, a new Brig in the South Shackles.
Battle of Barrowood. Western flank of Glorious Reclamation forces decimated.
Kate eats the heart of Tibor, momentarily becoming Vollensag. Mathus is blown apart by Gaspar's grenade launcher, ending the Shudderwood Civil War.
Glorious Reclamation takes and holds Westcrown.
Reaffirmation of the Covenant of Hell. Freya, Jason, Jamal, Draymus, Reese elevated to Bound Agent. Sethic Sacrificed.
The TPK participates in the defense of Goatshead Port, Firegrass Island, as they sink or take 2 Bronze Fleet Slave Galleons.
Meeting of the Twins
Meeting of the Twins
Daramid issues a warrant for the arrest of Estovion Lazarov of Ascanor Lodge. L-PIU is sent to execute the warrant.
L-PIU departs Lepidstadt to execute the warrant at Ascanor Lodge.
Freya is commanded to assemble the ingredients to build a Tathlum, a weapon of mass destruction.
CP-USS arrives in Chastel, meets Arnaud, and prepares to enter Ardeal.
L-PIU investigates the lost temple of Calistria (Temple of Salt)
Willowmere is cleared by CP-USS.
Meyanda visits Chastel for the first time and meets Taylor and Arnaud Blackwood.
L-PIU confronts Estovion on the Ascanor Dance Floor. Vilkacis possesses Farrah. Mindscape Battle.
Farrah draws a helmet for a troop of Iomedaean Paladins and tells them the helmet is at Northgarde. They believe her and depart immediately.
Brook-Nook is cleared by CP-USS.
Meyanda catches up with CP-USS and spends the day crafting items for them with Dinvaya.
Freya travels to Nidal to hunt Cave Giants, cyclops, trolls, and scout a sacred fountain location.
CP-USS visits Dea Pharasma Nua, receives blessing of Pharasma for 5 days, along with a vision of the peril of Northgarde.
Meyanda returns to Chastel, picks up Taylor Blackwood, and they begin traveling together.
The TPK investigates a found treasure map that leads them to Windward Isle and a secret library.
Freya travels to Isger to the pass of Dark Rain and Draymus speaks with the Wight Mother who enlists their aid.
Funeral for Estovion Lozarov. Farrah gives the Vilkacis to Cybrisa of the Broken Ones. L-PIU & the Brians are named "Friends of the Clans" by Cybrisa.
CP-USS enters Northgarde.
The TPK is attacked by Sahuagin and fights them off but Sha Feng is taken by them.
TPK Command Crew follows the Sahuagin to an underwater cave which is the lost dwarven settlement of Gol Khazak. An alliance is forged with the Sahuagin.
Freya, sent to slay the Frost Giants instead defeats them in a drinking game and betrays the Wight Mother.
Dame Sirona dies in Northgarde. She ascends to become a Deva of Saranrae, heals Elfrip's cursed hands, and promises to return at need.
Bujon is slain in combat vs the undead dwarves of Gol Khazak. The Sahuagin reincarnate him as an Iku-Turso (Eel man). Sha Feng is freed.
Jamal distracts an ancient Remorhaz and the team rescues a Noble Vampire from Nidal trapped in her coffin.
Dea-Pharasma-Nua buff expires for CP-USS.
Draymus, the vampire Violetta Pavel, and Corrine travel to Nidal to secure an operation for Draymus to remove his brain.
Hell's Bubbies begin to scout Citadel Dinyar, Hellknight Fortress and birthplace of the rebellion.
CP-USS visits the Penitent Hearth Inn, meets Vex, Sylvia, and Gabriel.
CP-USS visits the temple of Apsu in Southeastern Ardeal.
Indas Menador destroyed.
CP-USS arrives at feldgrau and is detected by the WW's outer guard of ravens. Stormgiant Graveknight destroyed.
CP-USS enters the town and battles several dozen WW creations meant for harvesting & processing undead. Unnamed Tomb signs found.
CP-USS enters the Unnamed Tomb and builds a DC40 secret door over the entrance in the granary.
Whispering Way ambushes CP-USS on the streets of Feldgrau. Elfrip is killed, but Sirona returns to save him. Auren Vrood killed & arrested.
CP-USS arrives in Carrion Hill and is attacked in the evening by strange aberrations bursting out of the townsfolks. Wendigo defeated.
CP-USS Battle of the Brewery. Elfrip killed but raised. Keeper Hyve killed and Chaos-Beast insider her revealed.
Keeper Grove confronted in the Jail underneath Crow-Barracks and he is killed, another Chaos-Beast revealed. Gaolers spared.
PLAN: The head of parnoneryx taken to Queen Abrogail who completes the ritual, creating the Tathlum.
